Boots.description:
+30% Attack Speed

UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed
Boots.name: Berserker's Greaves
Boots.plaintext: Enhances Movement Speed and Attack Speed
Boots.sanitizedDescription: +30% Attack Speed UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed

Boots.description:
UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +65 Movement Speed
UNIQUE Passive - Slow Resist: Movement slowing effects are reduced by 25%.
Boots.name: Boots of Swiftness
Boots.plaintext: Enhances Movement Speed and reduces the effect of slows
Boots.sanitizedDescription: UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +65 Movement Speed UNIQUE Passive - Slow Resist: Movement slowing effects are reduced by 25%.

Boots.description:
+25 Magic Resist

UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed
UNIQUE Passive - Tenacity: Reduces the duration of stuns, slows, taunts, fears, silences, blinds, polymorphs, and immobilizes by 20%.
Boots.name: Mercury's Treads
Boots.plaintext: Increases Movement Speed and reduces duration of disabling effects
Boots.sanitizedDescription: +25 Magic Resist UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed UNIQUE Passive - Tenacity: Reduces the duration of stuns, slows, taunts, fears, silences, blinds, polymorphs, and immobilizes by 20%.

Elixirs.description:
Level 9 required to purchase.

Click to Consume: Grants +30 Attack Damage and Bloodlust for 3 minutes.

Bloodlust: Dealing physical damage to champions heals for 15% of the damage dealt.

(Only one Elixir effect may be active at a time.)
Elixirs.name: Elixir of Wrath
Elixirs.plaintext: Temporarily grants Attack Damage and heals you when dealing physical damage to champions.
Elixirs.sanitizedDescription: Level 9 required to purchase. Click to Consume: Grants +30 Attack Damage and Bloodlust for 3 minutes. Bloodlust: Dealing physical damage to champions heals for 15% of the damage dealt. (Only one Elixir effect may be active at a time.)

Endgame Items.description:
+25 Attack Damage
+40% Attack Speed
+10% Life Steal

UNIQUE Passive: Basic attacks deal 6% of the target's current Health in bonus physical damage (max 60 vs. monsters and minions) on hit. Life Steal applies to this damage.
UNIQUE Active: Deals 10% of target champion's maximum Health (min. 100) as physical damage, heals for the same amount, and steals 25% of the target's Movement Speed for 3 seconds (90 second cooldown).
Endgame Items.name: Blade of the Ruined King
Endgame Items.plaintext: Deals damage based on target's Health, can steal Health and Movement Speed
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +25 Attack Damage +40% Attack Speed +10% Life Steal UNIQUE Passive: Basic attacks deal 6% of the target's current Health in bonus physical damage (max 60 vs. monsters and minions) on hit. Life Steal applies to this damage. UNIQUE Active: Deals 10% of target champion's maximum Health (min. 100) as physical damage, heals for the same amount, and steals 25% of the target's Movement Speed for 3 seconds (90 second cooldown).

Endgame Items.description:
+40% Attack Speed
+30% Critical Strike Chance
+5% Movement Speed

UNIQUE Passive - Wind's Fury: When basic attacking, bolts are fired at up to 2 enemies near the target, each dealing (25% of Attack Damage) physical damage. Bolts can critically strike and apply on hit effects.
UNIQUE Passive: Basic attacks deal an additional 15 physical damage on hit.
Endgame Items.name: Runaan's Hurricane
Endgame Items.plaintext: Ranged attacks fire two bolts at nearby enemies
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +40% Attack Speed +30% Critical Strike Chance +5% Movement Speed UNIQUE Passive - Wind's Fury: When basic attacking, bolts are fired at up to 2 enemies near the target, each dealing (25% of Attack Damage) physical damage. Bolts can critically strike and apply on hit effects. UNIQUE Passive: Basic attacks deal an additional 15 physical damage on hit.

Endgame Items.description:
+250 Health
+25 Attack Damage
+20% Critical Strike Chance
+15% Attack Speed
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+5% Movement Speed
+250 Mana

UNIQUE Passive - Rage: Basic attacks grant 20 Movement Speed for 2 seconds. Kills grant 60 Movement Speed instead. This Movement Speed bonus is halved for ranged champions.
UNIQUE Passive - Spellblade: After using an ability, the next basic attack deals bonus physical damage equal to 200% of base Attack Damage on hit (1.5 second cooldown).
Endgame Items.name: Trinity Force
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +250 Health +25 Attack Damage +20% Critical Strike Chance +15% Attack Speed +10% Cooldown Reduction +5% Movement Speed +250 Mana UNIQUE Passive - Rage: Basic attacks grant 20 Movement Speed for 2 seconds. Kills grant 60 Movement Speed instead. This Movement Speed bonus is halved for ranged champions. UNIQUE Passive - Spellblade: After using an ability, the next basic attack deals bonus physical damage equal to 200% of base Attack Damage on hit (1.5 second cooldown).

Endgame Items.description:
+35% Attack Speed
+30% Critical Strike Chance
+5% Movement Speed

Passive: Moving and attacking will make an attack Energized.

UNIQUE Passive - Shiv Lightning: Your Energized attacks deal 30~100 bonus magic damage (based on level) to up to 5 targets on hit (deals +75% bonus damage to minions and can critically strike).
Endgame Items.name: Statikk Shiv
Endgame Items.plaintext: Movement builds charges that release chain lightning on basic attack
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +35% Attack Speed +30% Critical Strike Chance +5% Movement Speed Passive: Moving and attacking will make an attack Energized. UNIQUE Passive - Shiv Lightning: Your Energized attacks deal 30~100 bonus magic damage (based on level) to up to 5 targets on hit (deals +75% bonus damage to minions and can critically strike).

Endgame Items.description:
+30% Attack Speed
+30% Critical Strike Chance
+8% Movement Speed

Passive: Moving and attacking will make an attack Energized.

UNIQUE Passive - Firecannon: Your Energized attacks gain 35% bonus range (+150 range maximum) and deal 50~200 bonus magic damage (based on level) on hit.

Energized attacks function on structures.
Endgame Items.name: Rapid Firecannon
Endgame Items.plaintext: Movement builds charges that release a sieging fire attack on release
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +30% Attack Speed +30% Critical Strike Chance +8% Movement Speed Passive: Moving and attacking will make an attack Energized. UNIQUE Passive - Firecannon: Your Energized attacks gain 35% bonus range (+150 range maximum) and deal 50~200 bonus magic damage (based on level) on hit. Energized attacks function on structures.

Endgame Items.description:
+40 Attack Damage

UNIQUE Passive - Giant Slayer: Grants up to +15% physical damage against enemy champions with greater maximum Health than you (+1.5% damage per 50 Health difference, maxing at 500 Health difference).
UNIQUE Passive - Last Whisper: +40% Bonus Armor Penetration.
Endgame Items.name: Lord Dominik's Regards
Endgame Items.plaintext: Overcomes enemies with high health and armor
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +40 Attack Damage UNIQUE Passive - Giant Slayer: Grants up to +15% physical damage against enemy champions with greater maximum Health than you (+1.5% damage per 50 Health difference, maxing at 500 Health difference). UNIQUE Passive - Last Whisper: +40% Bonus Armor Penetration.

Endgame Items.description:
+65 Attack Damage
+10% Cooldown Reduction

UNIQUE Passive: +20 Armor Penetration
UNIQUE Active: Grants +20% Movement Speed and +40% Attack Speed for 6 seconds (45 second cooldown).
Endgame Items.name: Youmuu's Ghostblade
Endgame Items.plaintext: Activate to greatly increase Movement Speed and Attack Speed
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +65 Attack Damage +10% Cooldown Reduction UNIQUE Passive: +20 Armor Penetration UNIQUE Active: Grants +20% Movement Speed and +40% Attack Speed for 6 seconds (45 second cooldown).

Jungle Items.description:
Limited to 1 Jungle item

+10% Life Steal vs. Monsters
+150% Base Mana Regen while in Jungle

UNIQUE Passive - Chilling Smite: Smite can be cast on enemy champions, dealing reduced true damage and stealing 20% movement speed for 2 seconds.
UNIQUE Passive - Tooth / Nail: Basic attacks deal 20 bonus damage vs. monsters. Damaging a monster steals 30 Health over 5 seconds. Killing a Large Monster grants +30 bonus experience.
Jungle Items.name: Stalker's Blade
Jungle Items.sanitizedDescription: Limited to 1 Jungle item +10% Life Steal vs. Monsters +150% Base Mana Regen while in Jungle UNIQUE Passive - Chilling Smite: Smite can be cast on enemy champions, dealing reduced true damage and stealing 20% movement speed for 2 seconds. UNIQUE Passive - Tooth / Nail: Basic attacks deal 20 bonus damage vs. monsters. Damaging a monster steals 30 Health over 5 seconds. Killing a Large Monster grants +30 bonus experience.

Jungle Items.description:
Limited to 1 Jungle item

+10% Life Steal vs. Monsters
+150% Base Mana Regen while in Jungle

Passive - Challenging Smite: Smite can be cast on enemy champions, marking them for 4 seconds. While marked, basic attacks deal true damage over 3 seconds, you have vision of them, and their damage to you is reduced by 20%.
UNIQUE Passive - Tooth / Nail: Basic attacks deal 20 bonus damage vs. monsters. Damaging a monster steals 30 Health over 5 seconds. Killing a Large Monster grants +30 bonus experience.
Jungle Items.name: Skirmisher's Sabre
Jungle Items.plaintext: Lets your Smite mark Champions, giving you combat power against them.
Jungle Items.sanitizedDescription: Limited to 1 Jungle item +10% Life Steal vs. Monsters +150% Base Mana Regen while in Jungle Passive - Challenging Smite: Smite can be cast on enemy champions, marking them for 4 seconds. While marked, basic attacks deal true damage over 3 seconds, you have vision of them, and their damage to you is reduced by 20%. UNIQUE Passive - Tooth / Nail: Basic attacks deal 20 bonus damage vs. monsters. Damaging a monster steals 30 Health over 5 seconds. Killing a Large Monster grants +30 bonus experience.

Jungle Items.description:
Limited to 1 Jungle item

+10% Life Steal vs. Monsters
+150% Base Mana Regen while in Jungle

UNIQUE Passive - Tooth / Nail: Basic attacks deal 20 bonus damage vs. monsters. Damaging a monster steals 30 Health over 5 seconds. Killing a Large Monster grants +30 bonus experience.
UNIQUE Active - Warding: Consumes a charge to place a Stealth Ward that reveals the surrounding area for 150 seconds. Holds up to 2 charges which refill upon visiting the shop.

(A player may only have 3 Stealth Wards on the map at one time. Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
Jungle Items.name: Tracker's Knife
Jungle Items.plaintext: Makes your Smite give extra gold from the enemy jungle
Jungle Items.sanitizedDescription: Limited to 1 Jungle item +10% Life Steal vs. Monsters +150% Base Mana Regen while in Jungle UNIQUE Passive - Tooth / Nail: Basic attacks deal 20 bonus damage vs. monsters. Damaging a monster steals 30 Health over 5 seconds. Killing a Large Monster grants +30 bonus experience. UNIQUE Active - Warding: Consumes a charge to place a Stealth Ward that reveals the surrounding area for 150 seconds. Holds up to 2 charges which refill upon visiting the shop. (A player may only have 3 Stealth Wards on the map at one time. Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

Starting Items.description:
Limited to 1 Trinket.

Active: Consume a charge to place an invisible Stealth Ward which reveals the surrounding area for 60 - 120 seconds.

Stores one charge every 180 - 120 seconds, up to 2 maximum charges.

Ward duration and recharge time gradually improve with level.

(Limit 3 Stealth Wards on the map per player. Switching to a Lens type trinket will disable Trinket use for 120 seconds.)
Starting Items.name: Warding Totem (Trinket)
Starting Items.sanitizedDescription: Limited to 1 Trinket. Active: Consume a charge to place an invisible Stealth Ward which reveals the surrounding area for 60 - 120 seconds. Stores one charge every 180 - 120 seconds, up to 2 maximum charges. Ward duration and recharge time gradually improve with level. (Limit 3 Stealth Wards on the map per player. Switching to a Lens type trinket will disable Trinket use for 120 seconds.)

Starting Items.description:
Limited to 1 type of Healing Potion.

UNIQUE Active: Consumes a charge to restore 60 Health and 35 Mana over 8 seconds. Holds up to 5 charges and refills upon visiting the shop.

Killing a Large Monster grants 1 charge.

(Killing a Large Monster at full charges will automatically consume the newest charge.)
Starting Items.name: Hunter's Potion
Starting Items.plaintext: Restores Health and Mana over time - Refills at shop and has increased capacity
Starting Items.sanitizedDescription: Limited to 1 type of Healing Potion. UNIQUE Active: Consumes a charge to restore 60 Health and 35 Mana over 8 seconds. Holds up to 5 charges and refills upon visiting the shop. Killing a Large Monster grants 1 charge. (Killing a Large Monster at full charges will automatically consume the newest charge.)

Starting Items.description:
Limited to 1 type of Healing Potion.

UNIQUE Active: Consumes a charge to restore 125 Health over 12 seconds. Holds up to 2 charges and refills upon visiting the shop.
Starting Items.name: Refillable Potion
Starting Items.plaintext: Restores Health over time. Refills at shop.
Starting Items.sanitizedDescription: Limited to 1 type of Healing Potion. UNIQUE Active: Consumes a charge to restore 125 Health over 12 seconds. Holds up to 2 charges and refills upon visiting the shop.
